tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Been to Brite smiles for scaling and polishing, had bleeding gums since long time, Dr.Sushma explained and educated me on oral health and detailed on root cause of my problem and future maintenance tips,I was very much impressed with treatment and Doctor and specially this detailing and educating patients on their health issues. I used suggested liquid just for 2 days I can feel the results and feel very healthy by following her tips.

Thank you Dr.Sushma..! üôè I can say she will be my favourite dental doctor üòä.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for ur feedback. üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to doctor for root canal treatment,  for which I was suffering with severe pain since a very long period,  doctor treated me without pain and stress,  I felt very relaxing after having her treatment, gave me detailed description of my teeth status before, after and during the treatment,best part of treatment is having X-ray at every stage of treatment with explanation to patients and attendant on future impacts and precautions to taken after the treatment.
Dr. Sushma is very friendly and have good patience in understanding patients each and every  problem.
Thank you Dr. Sushma
Thank you practo
reply_text: Thank you so much.  Grateful for your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all precautionary measures are taken care 100% coz covid19 situation which made me feel comfortable.Doctor is very humble, patience and listed to the trouble I was facing at 3 places of my teeth. Did a through clinical examination and explained every step clearly. Then did a digital x-ray after my concern and explained in detail about my teeth structure and all in detail. Gave best course of treatment option. Did complete teeth cleaning/deep cleaning with nominal price.After through explanation gave me needed medicine and explained all my questions.I'm very happy with end to end proceedure. Thank you Sushma mam. Note: Even doctor temperature and oxygen saturation reading is taken before treating so there is no fear.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your great feedback.  Take care. Get well soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sushma exhibited exceptional patience throughout my visit, taking the time to address all my concerns and thoroughly explain every aspect of the procedure. This not only put me at ease but also showcased a genuine commitment to patient well-being.The clarity with which Dr. Sushma explained the treatment plan, along with the step-by-step guidance provided, made the entire process comprehensible and alleviated any apprehensions I may have had. I highly recommend Dr. Sushma for anyone seeking a dentist as the skill and expertise displayed by Dr. Sushma were truly impressive. The precision and care taken during the procedure were indicative of a seasoned professional who is dedicated to delivering top-notch dental care.Thank you, Dr. Sushma and the entire team, for providing such an outstanding level of service! From start to finish, the level of care and professionalism demonstrated by Dr. Sushma Susik and the entire staff was truly commendable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sushma is one of the nicest doctors I've ever met. She takes the time to explain (and re-explain if needed) the problem to the patient. We met her for my mom's toothache problem, she patiently explained the xray to us and how she diagnosed the problem. She didn't straight away prescribe any invasive procedure but instead give medicines to fix the issue and my mom is much relieved now. I was impressed with all of this and decided to get my teeth checked as well which wasn't pre planned. She did GIC filling in my lower left wisdom tooth cavity, I'm not having any issues so far.
reply_text: Thank you for your marvelous feedback. Hopefully you are doing fine & expect to be pain free  in regards to your dental issues.
